# Import Data

```{r}
library(readr)
tcc_ceds_music <- read_csv("~/Documents/EDA/tcc_ceds_music.csv")
View(tcc_ceds_music)
```

# Checking Assertions

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(assertr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

#initial exploration of variables
class(tcc_ceds_music)

tcc_ceds_music%>%
  summarise(min(release_date), max(release_date))

#check that values are between 0-1 for acousticness, instrumentalness, valence, energy, and age
tcc_ceds_music%>%
  assert(within_bounds(0,1), acousticness:energy)%>%
  assert(within_bounds(0,1), age)

#check for NAs
tcc_ceds_music%>%
  assert(not_na, artist_name:age)

```

# Remove Unwanted Variables after Checking Correlations

```{r}

```

# Change Characteristic Types to Numeric Types for Variables

```{r}
tcc_ceds_music_cleaned$valence = as.numeric(tcc_ceds_music_cleaned$valence)
tcc_ceds_music_cleaned$energy = as.numeric(tcc_ceds_music_cleaned$energy)
```

# Delete NAs

```{r}
tcc_ceds_music_cleaned = na.omit(tcc_ceds_music_cleaned)
```

# Delete Wrong/Useless Information

In variable 'genre', there are three possible wrong/useless types.

```{r}
unique(tcc_ceds_music$genre)

tcc_ceds_music_cleaned = tcc_ceds_music_cleaned %>%
  filter(genre == "pop"|genre == "56"|genre == "hip hop"|genre == "country"|genre == "blues"|genre == "jazz"|genre == "reggae"|genre == "rock")
```

In variable 'topic', there are several possible wrong/useless types.

```{r}
unique(tcc_ceds_music$topic)

tcc_ceds_music_cleaned = tcc_ceds_music_cleaned %>%
  filter(topic == "sadness"|topic == "world/life"|topic == "music"|topic == "romantic"|topic == "violence"|topic == "obscene"|topic == "night/time"|topic == "feelings")
```
